contact.title: Contact Us
contact.sf-office: San Francisco Office: 851 Burlway Rd, Ste 605, Burlingame, CA, 94010
contact.miami-office: Miami Office: 15321 South Dixie Highway, Suite 302B, Palmetto Bay, FL, 33157

hero-section.title: Superior Tax and Accounting Services
hero-section.description: Optimize your financial strategy and reduce tax liabilities through our customized optimization services. Rely on our professional tax preparation, planning, and filing to succeed in today's competitive market.

consultation-section.title1: Your Integrated Finance Team is Just
consultation-section.description1: Contact Jiahua Accounting Services, our experienced team is ready to support you in achieving your financial goals.
consultation-section.description2: In less than 0.5 hours, Jiahua financial experts will determine your company's needs by understanding the following:
consultation-section.question1: What is your company's business and future growth goals?
consultation-section.question2: What is your company's current financial situation? Does your company have a professional bookkeeper and accounting software?
consultation-section.question3: How much time do you spend supporting your daily financial work?
consultation-section.question4: What is your main reason for contacting us?

process-section.title: Make it Simple
process-section.description: With these 5 steps completed, we can take care of all the rest.

step1.title: Answer 10 Questions
step1.description: This survey is free of charge and does not represent any commitment. Only takes a few minutes to complete.

step2.title: Take a 15-minute Call
step2.description: In less than 15 minutes, we will call you back to discuss your needs and provide you with an initial estimate.

step3.title: Receive a Customized Plan
step3.description: We will provide you with a customized plan based on your needs and goals.

step4.title: Upload Required Documents
step4.description: We will list all the documents required to make an application for you! Your information will be stored in a secure encrypted cloud.

step5.title: Enjoy the Benefits
step5.description: You can now focus on your business while we handle your financial needs.

why-choose-us-section.title: Why Choose Us?
why-choose-us-section.description: We will help you through the entire process

part1.title: The Most Professional Team
part1.description: Jiahua's accountants, lawyers, data analysts, and payroll experts have established a professional system that can maximize your credit

part2.title: The Most Efficient Process
part2.description: Jiahua Accounting Services provides you with the most convenient and efficient tax and accounting services

part3.title: The Best Follow-up Service
part3.description: After completing the service, there is no one to follow up? Don't worry, Jiahua will always be with you to provide follow-up service consultation.

Services.title: Services
Services.description: We will help you through the entire process
